description.displayText: she is the sweetest girl we have ever met, we are very thankful for all that she has done for us! the most reliable and trustworthy person you can come across. my girls and my family love this girl. and just let me tell you, consider it a privilege to have this girl work for you. it's not just work ,her beautiful friendship was the best thing we got out of it. most definitely recommend to give her a chance to steal your hearts! we love you Liza!!
description.originalText: she is the sweetest girl we have ever met, we are very thankful for all that she has done for us! the most reliable and trustworthy person you can come across. my girls and my family love this girl. and just let me tell you, consider it a privilege to have this girl work for you. it's not just work ,her beautiful friendship was the best thing we got out of it. most definitely recommend to give her a chance to steal your hearts! we love you Liza!!

description.displayText:
Liza is a wonderful nanny! We were lucky to have her watch our little boy when he was around a year old. We added onto a nanny share with another family. So, Liza watch our boy and a rambunctious 2 and a half year old together. I especially appreciated how she prioritized outdoor play, would take them to the library, and she incorporated music into care (she is a classically trained pianist). I
Wholeheartedly recommend her.
